title: Canada imposes a 100% tariff on imports of Chinese-made electric vehicles
description: Canada announced a 100% tariff on Chinese-made electric vehicles and a 25% tariff on Chinese steel and aluminum. Prime Minister Trudeau's move aims to address China's unfair global market practices. The decision aligns with recent actions by the US and EU, ensuring Canada does not become a dumping ground for Chinese oversupply.
